interface.name: pcmcia_stub
interface.summary: PCMCIA stub interface. No access allowed.

interface.name: pcmcia_domtrans_cardmgr
interface.summary: Execute cardmgr in the cardmgr domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: pcmcia_use_cardmgr_fds
interface.summary: Inherit and use file descriptors from cardmgr.

interface.name: pcmcia_domtrans_cardctl
interface.summary: Execute cardctl in the cardmgr domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: pcmcia_run_cardctl
interface.summary: Execute cardmgr in the cardctl domain, and allow the specified role the cardmgr domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the cardmgr domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the cardmgr domain to use.

interface.name: pcmcia_manage_pid
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete cardmgr pid files.

interface.name: pcmcia_manage_pid_chr_files
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete cardmgr runtime character nodes.
